alert.note: Alert for Eastern San Juan Mountains Above 10000 Ft; La Garita Mountains Above 10000 Ft (Colorado) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued October 27 at 3:59AM MDT until October 27 at 6:00PM MDT by NWS Pueblo
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY IN EFFECT UNTIL 6 PM MDT THIS EVENING... * WHAT...Snow. Snow accumulations of 2 to 7 inches. * WHERE...La Garita and Eastern San Juan Mountains Above 10000 Feet. * WHEN...Until 6 PM MDT this evening. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions. The hazardous conditions could impact the morning or evening commute. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Embedded thunderstorms this afternoon could cause locally intense snowfall rates and poor travel conditions.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. The latest road conditions for the state you are calling from can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.

area.areaDesc: Eastern San Juan Mountains Above 10000 Ft; La Garita Mountains Above 10000 Ft
